mean_en: a monoamine neurotransmitter found in the brain and essential for the normal functioning of the central nervous system; as a drug (trade names Dopastat and Intropin) it is used to treat shock and hypotension
sentence: Dopamine plays an important part in the brain\u0027s systems for pleasure and reward.
sentence_trans: 多巴胺在脑系统中扮演重要角色，它有传递快乐、奖励的功能。
